forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 53F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
